subject: Wondering which control box to get
description_text:
Hello,

I just bought Simsonn Plus X pedals with 2 VAM Pro haptics, I did not pay
enough attention and did not buy the control box.

I am now wondering which one to get, since on presentation the VAM Pro are
connected to Pro X control box ?

I am also wondering if Pro X control box is stronger against EMI ? If then
can I put Pro X control box onto Plus X?


Thank you very much for you answer.

conversations.body_text: Hello, you may simply purchase the Plus X control box. While the Pro X Ultra control box previously offered superior interference resistance compared to the Plus X, the current Plus X control box now incorporates the same components.
